sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SACKBUT, a muſical instrument of the wind kind, being a fort of trumpet, though different from the common trumpet both in form and ſize; it is fit to play a baſs, and is contrived to be drawn out or ſhortened, according to the tone required, whether grave or acute. The Italians call it trombone, and the Latins tuba ductilis.
